lyrics.text: First listen and then answer the question.
lyrics.translation: 首先听录音，然后回答问题。

lyrics.text: The secretary told me that Mr. Hamsworth would see me.
lyrics.translation: 秘书告诉我，汉姆斯沃斯先生会见我。

lyrics.text: I felt very nervous when I went into his office.
lyrics.translation: 我走进他的办公室时感到非常紧张。

lyrics.text: He did not look up from his desk when I entered.
lyrics.translation: 我进去时，他没有从办公桌上抬起头来。

lyrics.text: After I had sat down, he said that business was very bad.
lyrics.translation: 我坐下后，他说生意非常糟糕。

lyrics.text: He told me that the firm could not afford to pay such large salaries.
lyrics.translation: 他告诉我公司付不起这么高的薪水。
已经有二十个人离开了。

lyrics.text: I knew that my turn had come.
Mr. Hamsworth, I said in a weak voice, don't interrupt, he said.
lyrics.translation: 汉姆斯沃斯先生，我用微弱的声音说，别打断，他说。

lyrics.text: Then he smiled and told me I would receive an extra thousand pounds a year.
lyrics.translation: 然后他笑了，告诉我每年会额外得到一千英镑。
